title: difficulty
description: Sets the difficulty level (Peaceful, Easy, Normal, Hard) using difficulty enum or integer.

fields.title: difficulty
fields.description: Set the difficulty using the Difficult enum: `p` or `peaceful`, `e` or `easy`, `n` or `normal`, `h` or `hard`.

overloads.title: Difficulty using difficulty enum: p, peaceful, e, easy, n, normal, h, hard
Difficulty using integer: 0 (Peaceful), 1 (Easy), 2 (Normal), 3 (Hard).
overloads.description: Set the difficulty using an integer.
